alert.note: Alert for McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:11AM CDT until July 09 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GARVIN...SOUTHERN SEMINOLE...CENTRAL PONTOTOC... SOUTH CENTRAL POTTAWATOMIE AND SOUTHEASTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 611 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Asher to 7 miles southeast of Wanette to 3 miles south of Vanoss, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ada, Stratford, Konawa, Byng, Asher, Wanette, Francis, Fitzhugh, Sasakwa, and Vanoss. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
